/config.description: Share where the config file should be stored.
/config.label: Config storage [e.g. hp-conf]

/downloads.description: Share where the music will be downloaded to.
/downloads.label: Download storage [e.g. hp-downloads]

/music.description: Share where the music library is located.
/music.label: Music library [e.g. hp-misic]

Headphones.description:
Headphones is an automated music downloader for NZB and Torrent.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Headphones.more_info:
Setting up the application

Go after installation to the Headphones web interface to configure your Headphones installation.
